div.head: Against rednesses of the face
div.ab: Make a small lead cap and wear it overnight. Excellent secret. Try a lead mask.

div.head: Medicine of orientals against all maladies
div.ab: Dry some rosemary in the month of May, then fill this bowl with powder made of it, and place a lit charcoal on top. And, receive the smoke by a quite tightened mouth having closed your mouth well, and a part will come out by your nose. But if you want to purge the head also pinch the nose. Against colds, rheums, and other maladies.

Founders use [this earth] to make the handles of their bells. Before it [the earth] is used, they beat it quite hard, [and] then they leave it to dry gradually in the shade & for a long time. And they mold it quite neatly. But the earth must not be sandy &; rather, the earth must be carefully selected & soft.

div.head: Recipe for making bronze and many kind of varnishes
div.ab: To make an excellent varnish with clear water which you will use with a brush and which [the varnish] dries immediately for applying to paper, a little table, or any other thing
First, you will take five ounces of spirits and one ounce of benzoin. Crush them between two pieces of paper or cards or in a mortar.
